name: Sanddrift Drake
movement: climb 20 ft., walk 40 ft., burrow 40 ft.
description: The Sanddrift Drake is a large, dragon-like creature with natural armor, adapted to sandy environments. It has a sleek body built for agility and stealth.
memorable: The drake can burrow silently through sand and uses ambush tactics, making it a cunning predator.
goals: To hunt and ambush prey in its sandy habitat.
relations: It may encounter other desert-dwelling creatures or serve under a more powerful dragon.
environment: Usually found in sandy terrain, such as deserts.
strengths: High Dexterity allows for effective stealth and quick strikes. Immune to fire damage.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma may hinder its problem-solving and social interactions.
attacks: Multiattack featuring a bite that can halve speed or paralyze and claws dealing slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Heatwave Breath can inflict significant fire damage and cause exhaustion.
senses: Possesses tremorsense, allowing it to detect vibrations through the ground effectively.
skills: Proficient in stealth, enabling it to hide in sandy terrain easily.
additional_information: Desert Camouflage gives advantage on Stealth checks in sandy environments.
Sand Glide ability allows it to move through sand without leaving traces.
Capable of sustaining considerable damage due to high hit points.
Uses ambush tactics effectively by burrowing and striking unexpectedly.
Paralysis feature adds a strategic danger to its bite attack.
